meanings.definition: Having more wrinkles or creases than something else.
meanings.sent1: The old book was crinklier than the new one.
meanings.sent2: Her crinklier skin showed her age.
meanings.sent3: The crinklier the paper, the louder it crinkles.
meanings.sent4: His crinklier smile told a story of a life well-lived.
meanings.sent5: The crinklier the leaves, the more beautiful the sound of walking on them.

meanings.definition: Becoming more wrinkled or creased over time.
meanings.sent1: The crinklier fabric was a sign of its age.
meanings.sent3: The crinklier the map, the more adventures it had seen.
meanings.sent4: Her crinklier voice hinted at years of laughter.
meanings.sent5: The crinklier the road, the more memories it held.
